name: BBTOLOFE Chapter 3 Android (Fixed Sounds)
description:
Story: In 2005 Baldi has a brother named bolder and bolder was very good at experimenting and science then he made a clone machine so baldi goed in to clone himself but there was an error then bolder tried again and it worked but something was strange baldi has become a SCP and the clone himself died of failing experiment a few years later bolder asked player to get in the old lab to collect 7 stuff to give him but remember YOU ARE NOT ALONE!

This story is from Chapter 1...

Bbtolofe chapter 3 is here on android I know I know but sounds are fixed but you must wait for like 4 min to load and also you can donate me 10.00 dollars if you want to so I can buy baldi basics plus and also credits to BMAS 2 for making this mod and goodbye :)

Bonus:
